questions.question: In the context of Knowledge Representation, what term refers to the process of encoding knowledge in a way that can be interpreted by machines? (10)
Which Knowledge Representation technique uses a directed acyclic graph to represent knowledge with nodes and edges? ________ Network (8)
What is the process of transforming raw data into a suitable format for analysis and modeling? Data __________ (11)
Which Data Preparation technique involves filling in missing values in a dataset? (8)
What type of Data Preparation method is used to reduce the dimensionality of data while preserving its important characteristics? Feature ________ (9)
Which Data Preparation technique involves scaling or transforming features to a standard range? (11)
In Knowledge Representation, what term describes the process of reasoning with uncertainty or incomplete information? ______ Logic (5)
Which Knowledge Representation language is widely used in representing and reasoning about knowledge in the field of Artificial Intelligence? Web _______ Language (8)
